name: Gorgon
description: A large, bull-like creature covered in gleaming iron-like plates with powerful horns.
memorable: Possesses the ability to petrify prey with toxic gas and has high durability.
goals: Protect its territory aggressively and intimidate intruders.
relations: Often found in company of other aggressive creatures in remote locations.
strengths: High Armor Class and hit points make it durable; petrifying breath is a significant threat.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity limits agility, and lacks magical abilities.
attacks: Utilizes powerful Gore and Hooves attacks for significant melee damage.
most_powerful_ability: Petrifying Breath can restrain enemies and turn them to stone.
senses: Has a passive perception of 14, allowing it to notice hidden threats effectively.
skills: Possesses a good perception skill of +4, aiding in spotting hidden creatures.
additional_information: Can knock enemies prone with a charging attack.
Resistant to exhaustion and the frightened condition.
Can retaliate with poisonous gas when attacked nearby.
High Strength score allows effective melee combat.
test_queries: large bull-like creature that petrifies with breath
petrifying gas attack in a large creature
strong melee attacker with horn attacks
